name: Pitch Ball Racer
description:
Pitch Ball Racer

A turn based racing game with balls, loosely based on the boardgame pitchcars.

Set your ball on the starting line by moving and clicking the left mouse button.

(in browser game to move the ball you must keep down the second mouse button)

Rotate the camera by moving the mouse to aim and press the left mouse button to add power, release the mouse button at the prefered position of the power ramp.

(in browser game to rotate the camera you must keep down the second mouse button)

If you fall out you are going back to the previous position.

Previous position is the position when you shooted the ball.

Order of play changes according to the position of the balls.

IMPORTANT

It plays better with friends.
